DOC.brief_summary: Compare the effect of an intravitreal injection of bevacizumab previous or posterior of panretinal laser photocoagulation (PRLP) with a pattern laser; to prevent and reduce diabetic macular edema (DME) in patients with proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) with DME.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Effects of Bevacizumab Before vs After Pattern Panretinal Photocoagulation
DOC.criteria: Patients with proliferative diabetic retinopathy patients with macular edema patients with previous treatments patients with ocular surgeries
